summary: This document discusses an alert regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was initially flagged due to a false positive related to compliance issues with a different individual of the same name. After review, it was determined that Richard D. Kahn is not the same person as the one flagged, and he is working as a trustee for a trust account at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. The document includes communications between compliance team members regarding the alert and clearance process.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn was initially flagged due to a compliance alert that was later determined to be a false positive.
The alert was related to a different Richard Kahn who had issues with PennMont Securities.
Michael Vila confirmed that Richard D. Kahn is not barred from NYSA Arca and has been working at HBRK Associates Inc for three years.
The document includes internal communications regarding the compliance clearance process.
Richard D. Kahn is a trustee for a trust account being opened at Deutsche Bank.
